title: Episode 220 w/ Family Episode - Another One 2020
itunes:title: Episode 220 w/ Family Episode - Another One 2020
description:
N.O.R.E. & DJ EFN are the Drink Champs. In this episode we are joined by the rest of the DC Family! Recapping our legendary interview with DJ Khaled, the family shares their favorite moments about the episode.

In this episode the family talks about the recent entanglement between Jada and Will Smith, we also discuss sports with topics such as the NBA bubble, name change for the Washington Redskins and Michael Jordan’s The Last Dance documentary.

As the D.C. Family gets #JadaDrunk, the guys review their favorite moments of the Verzuz battle between Fabolous & Jadakiss, Kanye West running for President and much much more!

Listen and subscribe at http://www.drinkchamps.com

Follow:
